title: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: An Ignored Disorder in Primary School Children in Arar, Northern Saudi Arabia
abstract: 15Oct 2016 ATTENTION DEFICIT HYPERACTIVITY DISORDER: AN IGNORED DISORDER IN PRIMARY SCHOOL CHILDREN IN ARAR, NORTHERN SAUDI ARABIA. Nagah Mohamed Aboel-Fetoh , Jamilah Faisal Alnathir , Aminah Abdullah Alhussain and Hayat Faisal Alnathir. Assistant professor of Public Health and Community Medicine Department, Faculty of Medicine, Sohag University, Sohag, Egypt and Faculty of Medicine, Northern border University, Arar, KSA. 6th year students, Faculty of Medicine, Northern border University, Arar, KSA. 3rd year students, Faculty of Medicine, Northern border University, Arar, KSA.
